Author: RetailSlaveNo1
Text: Thank you. I’m struggling with the balance, I’ve never been one for anything but extremes aha. My brain is all or nothing with everything and it’s a mess.

Author: LolitaJane
Text: This is a really good illustration of how EDs are just so insidious.  It’s like there are all these traps laid in your mind, and the wrong word or thought can set them off and then you’re just beholden to it like nothing ever changed.  I’m sorry you’re going through this.  You deserve to be in recovery, you deserve to be healthy.  If a change in weight would be healthy for you, then you deserve to go about slowly and uncompulsively.
